events.message: The customer filed a claim reporting a car accident that occurred on 2024-05-09 involving another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident due to the involvement of the insured’s vehicle in a collision.
An agent specializing in auto claims was assigned promptly to assist the customer throughout the claims process.
The insurance company sent an acknowledgment confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and outlining the next steps.
The customer was requested to provide photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and medical bills related to the collision.
All requested documents including accident photos, police report, and repair estimates were submitted by the claimant on time.
An investigation into the auto accident claim commenced to verify details and assess the extent of damages and liability.
The investigation was completed and confirmed the insured’s liability was limited and damages were consistent with the report.
A settlement offer was proposed to the claimant based on repair costs and policy coverage for the auto accident damages.
The customer provided positive feedback thanking the agent for clear communication and timely handling of the claim.
The claim was officially approved following acceptance of the settlement offer and verification of all submitted evidence.
Payment to cover repair costs was processed and issued to the customer promptly as per the approved settlement agreement.
The claim file was closed successfully after payment issuance and confirmation of vehicle repairs being completed.
The claim documents and records were archived in accordance with company policy for future reference and compliance.
